name: Brick Wall Defender
description:
This prototype is mostly inspired by "Oink!", the classic game from Activision, which debuted on Atari on 1983.

In "Oink!", a wolf was destroying the pig's house floor, brick by brick. Your objective was to rebuild the bricks, so the wolf coundn't aim for pigs.

In Brick Wall Defender, you play a similar role, except the walls are rotating around your as well as the enemy. To rebuild an brick, you simply point toward it and press the action button, as long as you have ammo, that constantly spawns around you.

The objective of the game is to reach the furthest level you can.
